name: Infinity Beats Song Edition
description:
Infinity Beats Song Edition is a classic rhythm game where you need to hit the notes based on the rhythm of the music.
- Classic rhythm game style where you simply hit the notes based on the beats and melodies.
- Handpicked song tracks from talented composers with catchy melodies and nice beats.
- 3+ levels for each track and adding.
- 2-key, 4-key, and 6-key levels.
- Tons of challenges to complete and unlock many rewards in game.
- Highly customizable stages, special effects and skins.
- Different Mods to modify game play.
- Very smooth game play.
- Futuristic graphic styles with a space journey theme.
- All songs are free to play (with timed energy).
- Global ranks. (requires Game Center)
- Achievements.
